dmpFormat.rule: Choose one from the list: common metadata; JST; AMED; METI

identifier.rule: Array of RepositoryObject and PropertyValue entities.
identifier.description: Repository where the data is managed; e-Rad project ID; any other identifier which indicates research project

dateCreated.rule: MUST be a string in ISO 8601 date format and MAY be a timestamp down to the millisecond. Time zone is in UTC

creator.description: All data creators involved in research project

distribution.required: MUST if accessRights has open access and all open-access data set is available from single URL.
distribution.rule: Object of @id term from DataDownload entity, e.g. "{"@id": "https://example.com/downloadlink"}".

hasPart.rule: Array of Dataset and File entities which indicate files and directories of research project.
hasPart.description: All data creators involved in research project

@id.rule: MUST be either a URI Path relative to the RO Crate root (stated in identifier term of RootDataEntity) or an absolute URI.  When the file from outside of the repository, @id SHOULD be directly downloadable by a simple retrieval (e.g. HTTP GET), permitting redirections and HTTP/HTTPS authentication.

dmpDataNumber.rule: Object of @id term from DMP Entity, e.g. "{"@id": "#dmp:1"}".

contentSize.rule: Integer plus "B" as units, e.g. "1560B". Be validated with the size listed in the DMP.

sdDatePublished.required: MUST if the file from outside the RO-Crate Root
sdDatePublished.rule: MUST be a string in ISO 8601 date format

@id.rule: MUST be either a URI Path relative to the RO Crate root (stated in identifier term of RootDataEntity). SHOULD end with "/".

dmpDataNumber.rule: Object of @id term from DMP entity, e.g. "{"@id": "#dmp:1"}".

contentSize.rule: Integer plus "B" as units, e.g. "1560B". Be validated with the size listed in the DMP.
contentSize.description: Total file size under the directory

accessRights.rule: Choose one from the list: open access; restricted access; embargoed access; metadata only access

availabilityStarts.required: MUST if accessRights has embargoed access
availabilityStarts.rule: MUST be a string in ISO 8601 date format. Be velified that the value(ISO date) is the future than the time of verification.
availabilityStarts.description: When the data will be available (open access)

distribution.required: MUST if accessRights has open access and different for each data set.
distribution.rule: Object of @id term from DataDownload entity, e.g. "{"@id": "https://example.com/downloadlink"}".

contentSize.rule: Integer plus "B" as units, e.g. "1560B". Be validated with the size listed in the DMP.
contentSize.description: Total file size under the directory
